EMtree 0.1.0
  • Reference

internal function

FitBetaStatic.Rd

internal function

FitBetaStatic(beta.init, psi, maxIter = 50, eps1 = 1e-06,
  eps2 = 1e-04, verbatim = TRUE, plot = FALSE)

Arguments

beta.init

initialization of beta weights
psi

psi matrix, filled with ratios of bivariate probabilities over marginals, which can in the Gaussian wase be deduced from the correlation matrix.
maxIter

maximum number of iterations
eps1

variation higher bound of beta weights
eps2

variation higher bound of log likelihood
verbatim

boolean
plot

boolean

Value

  • edges_prob: p x p matrix of edges probabilities

  • edges_weight: p x p matrix of edges weights for any spanning tree

  • logpY: vector of log-likelihoods

  • maxIter: final number of iterations EMtree has ran

  • timeEM: EMtree computation time

Examples

n=30
p=10
S=5
Y=data_from_scratch("tree",p=p,n=n)$data
beta = matrix(1/10,10,10)
psi=Psi_alpha(cor(Y), n)$psi
FitEM = FitBetaStatic(beta.init=beta, psi=psi, maxIter = 6, verbatim=TRUE, plot=TRUE)
#> 
#> Likelihoods: 21.76245 , 21.80154 , 21.80161 , 
#> 
#> Convergence took 0.06 secs  and  3  iterations.
#> Likelihood difference = 6.622672e-05 
#> Betas difference = 1.084681e-07
